statements: SELECT city_name, zip_code, median_income, median_rent FROM HousingData;
SELECT * FROM HousingData WHERE city_name = 'New York';
SELECT city_name, median_rent FROM HousingData WHERE median_income > 50000;
SELECT city_name, median_rent FROM HousingData WHERE zip_code BETWEEN 90001 AND 90030;
SELECT city_name, median_income FROM HousingData ORDER BY median_income DESC;
SELECT city_name, median_income FROM HousingData WHERE median_rent > 1000 ORDER BY city_name DESC
SELECT city_name, zip_code, median_income, median_rent FROM HousingData WHERE median_income > 50000 AND median_rent < 1500 ORDER BY median_income ASC
SELECT * FROM HousingData WHERE median_rent = 1200
SELECT city_name, median_income FROM HousingData WHERE zip_code IN (90210, 10001, 30301) ORDER BY median_income DESC
SELECT city_name, median_rent FROM HousingData WHERE median_income BETWEEN 40000 AND 60000 ORDER BY median_rent
SELECT city_name, median_income FROM housing_affordability
SELECT property_name, property_type, rent_price FROM rental_prices WHERE property_type='Apartment'
SELECT city_name, median_income, median_rent FROM housing_affordability ORDER BY median_income DESC
SELECT * FROM rental_prices WHERE rent_price < 2000
SELECT city_name, median_income, median_rent FROM housing_affordability WHERE median_income > 50000 ORDER BY median_income ASC
SELECT city_name, median_income, median_rent FROM housing_affordability WHERE median_income > 50000 ORDER BY median_income DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT city_name, median_rent, median_income FROM housing_affordability WHERE city_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY city_name ASC;

SELECT city_name, median_income, median_rent FROM housing_affordability JOIN rental_prices ON housing_affordability.city_id = rental_prices.property_id WHERE rental_prices.rent_price < 2000 ORDER BY city_name ASC;
SELECT property_name, rent_price, property_type FROM rental_prices WHERE rent_price BETWEEN 1000 AND 1500 ORDER BY rent_price DESC;

SELECT city_name, median_income, median_rent, property_name, rent_price FROM housing_affordability JOIN rental_prices ON housing_affordability.city_id = rental_prices.property_id WHERE median_income > 60000 AND property_type='Apartment' ORDER BY city_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM HousingAffordability;
SELECT id, address, sq_ft, rental_price FROM HousingAffordability WHERE occupancy_status = TRUE;
SELECT neighborhood, rental_price FROM HousingAffordability WHERE rental_price > 1500;
SELECT * FROM HousingPolicies WHERE active = TRUE ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT policy_name, description, active FROM HousingPolicies WHERE end_date > CURRENT_DATE();
SELECT * FROM HousingAffordability WHERE occupancy_status = True;
SELECT id, address, sq_ft, rental_price FROM HousingAffordability WHERE neighborhood = 'Downtown' AND rental_price > 2000;
SELECT id, address, neighborhood, sq_ft, rental_price FROM HousingAffordability WHERE sq_ft BETWEEN 1000 AND 1500;
SELECT * FROM HousingPolicies WHERE active = True AND start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, policy_name, description, active FROM HousingPolicies WHERE description LIKE '%affordable%' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT city, neighborhood, median_income, median_rent FROM housing_affordability;
SELECT * FROM housing_affordability WHERE city='New York';
SELECT city, median_rent FROM housing_affordability ORDER BY median_income DESC;
SELECT neighborhood, median_income FROM housing_affordability WHERE median_income > 50000;
SELECT city, median_rent FROM housing_affordability WHERE median_income BETWEEN 40000 AND 60000;
SELECT city, neighborhood, median_income, median_rent FROM housing_affordability ORDER BY median_income DESC, city ASC
SELECT city, median_income, median_rent FROM housing_affordability WHERE median_income > 50000
SELECT city, neighborhood, median_income, median_rent FROM housing_affordability WHERE city = 'New York' OR city = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY median_rent ASC
SELECT neighborhood, median_income FROM housing_affordability WHERE median_rent < 2000
SELECT * FROM housing_affordability WHERE median_income BETWEEN 30000 AND 60000 ORDER BY neighborhood
SELECT * FROM housing_affordability;
SELECT city, state, median_income FROM housing_affordability WHERE state='California';
SELECT city, median_income, housing_price FROM housing_affordability WHERE housing_price < 500000;
SELECT city, state, population FROM demographic_data ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT city, avg_rent FROM rental_prices WHERE rental_type='Apartment' ORDER BY avg_rent ASC;
SELECT city, state, median_income FROM housing_affordability WHERE median_income > 60000 ORDER BY median_income DESC;
SELECT city, state, rental_type, avg_rent FROM rental_prices WHERE state = 'California' ORDER BY avg_rent ASC;
SELECT city, state, population, median_age FROM demographic_data WHERE population > 100000 ORDER BY median_age DESC, population DESC;
SELECT city, state, policy_name, policy_description FROM housing_policy WHERE state = 'New York' ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT city, state, available_units, vacancy_rate FROM housing_supply WHERE available_units < 50 AND vacancy_rate < 5.0 ORDER BY city ASC, vacancy_rate DESC;
